meanings.sent1: The purblindly decision led to many mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She often makes purblindly choices without thinking.
meanings.sent3: His purblindly attempt at solving the puzzle only made it more confusing.
meanings.sent4: The purblindly leader failed to see the consequences of his actions.
meanings.sent5: The purblindly student struggled to grasp the concept.

meanings.definition: In a dim-sighted or partially blind manner
meanings.sent1: He stumbled purblindly in the dark room.
meanings.sent2: The old man walked purblindly with his cane.
meanings.sent3: She searched purblindly for her lost keys in the cluttered room.
meanings.sent4: The fog enveloped the city, making it appear purblindly to those outside.
meanings.sent5: The bat flew purblindly through the cave, relying on echolocation.
